mapper.select:
SELECT
GROUP_CONCAT(t1.val) contactInfoVals, t1.id , t1.customerID, t1.py , t1.sex , CASE WHEN t1.sex = 0 THEN '先生' WHEN t1.sex = 1 THEN '女士' ELSE '' END sexName, t1.headPic , t1.szm , t1.dept , t1.position , CONCAT(t1.firstName , t1.lastName) name
FROM ( SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT tc.id , tc.schemaID , tc.py , tc.sex , tc.headPic , tc.szm , tc.dept , tc.position , tc.firstName , tc.lastName , tci.type , tci.val, tcc.customerID FROM tbl_contact tc LEFT JOIN tbl_contact_info tci ON(tc.id , tc.schemaID) =(tci.contactID , tci.schemaID) and tci.type = 'email' left join tbl_customer_contact tcc on (tc.id,tc.schemaID) = (tcc.contactID , tcc.schemaID) ) t
INSTR(CONCAT(t.firstName,t.lastName),#{name}) >0 or
instr(t.val,#{phone}) >0 or
INSTR(t.val,#{email})
and t.customerID = #{customerId}
) t1 group by t1.id , t1.py , t1.sex , t1.headPic , t1.szm , t1.dept , t1.position , t1.firstName , t1.lastName , t1.customerID

select count( DISTINCT t.id) from ( select tc.id, tc.firstName, tc.lastName, tci.type, tci.val, tcc.customerID
from tbl_contact tc left join tbl_contact_info tci on (tc.id,tc.schemaID) = (tci.contactID ,tci.schemaID) left join tbl_customer_contact tcc on(tc.id ,tc.schemaID) = (tcc.contactID,tcc.schemaID) ) t
INSTR(CONCAT(t.firstName,t.lastName),#{name}) >0 or
instr(t.val,#{phone}) >0 or
INSTR(t.val,#{email})
and t.customerID = #{customerId}

select tc.id, CONCAT(tc.firstName,tc.lastName) name, tc.position, tc.dept, tpc.role from tbl_contact tc left join tbl_project_contact tpc
on(tc.id ,tc.schemaID) = (tpc.contactID,tpc.schemaID)
where tpc.projectID = #{projectId} and tpc.schemaID = #{schemaId} and tpc.isDelete = 0 and tc.isDelete = 0
